header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to setting up two-factor authentication

Your account has administrative privileges under business account "%companyName%", this means your account has access to other users' data. In order to protect their info we require that you set up two-factor authentication on your account. If you don't wish to set up two-factor authentication, then you can ask other business administrators to %link1_on%downgrade%link1_off% your account access level to "No Access (regular member)" or simply %link2_on%delete%link2_off% your business account if you are the last and only administrator.
trans-unit.target: 您的账户在企业账户“%companyName%”下拥有管理权限，也就是说您的账户可以访问其他用户的数据。为了保护他们的信息，我们要求在您的账户上设置双重认证。如果您不希望设置双重认证，那么您可以要求其他企业管理员您的账户访问级别%link1_on%降级%link1_off%为“无访问权限（普通会员）”，或者，如果您是最后一个也是唯一的管理员，则可以直接%link2_on%删除%link2_off%您的企业账户。

trans-unit.note: Short form of "not/available”

trans-unit.source: Balance Watch credits are only available to AwardWallet Plus members. By upgrading to Plus you support our development efforts, which makes the service better. We appreciate your support!

trans-unit.note: What is Balance Watch? Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. If the option is enabled, AwardWallet will update an account in the background every hour during 4 days and send users a desktop, mobile, and email notification as soon as a change is detected. To use this feature users should purchase Balance Watch Credits.

trans-unit.source: At the moment you don't have any Balance Watch Credits available. In order to use this feature, you need to purchase some credits.
trans-unit.target: 目前您还没有可用的余额关注点数。要使用此功能，您需要购买一些点数。
trans-unit.note: What is Balance Watch? Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. If the option is enabled, AwardWallet will update an account in the background every hour during 4 days and send users a desktop, mobile, and email notification as soon as a change is detected. To use this feature users should purchase Balance Watch Credits.

trans-unit.source: Currently, you do not have enough money on your account to enable Balance Watch. Every time you enable Balance Watch we charge your account $5, please add some funds (at least $5) to your account to enable Balance Watch.
trans-unit.target: 目前，您的账户上没有足够的资金来启用Balance Watch。每次您启用Balance Watch，我们都会向您的账户收取$5，请向您的账户充值（至少$5）以便启用Balance Watch。

trans-unit.note: https://www.dropbox.com/s/6ey6xgpu09381zs/Expected%20number%20of%20miles.png?dl=0 Please take into account which translation you did (or will do) for “Expected number of”

What is Balance Watch? Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. If the option is enabled, AwardWallet will update an account in the background every hour during 4 days and send users a desktop, mobile, and email notification as soon as a change is detected. To use this feature users should purchase Balance Watch Credits. In this case it's a name of the button to enable the feature: https://www.dropbox.com/s/5vppcwcsg90gezp/Balance%20Watch.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: If enabled, we will frequently update this account in the background until we detect a change in the balance. For more info please read %link_faq_on%this FAQ%link_faq_off%. You should get a push notification if a change is detected. Please %link_notify_on%click here%link_notify_off% to verify that push notifications are working for you.

trans-unit.source: Please start entering the name of a provider from which you initiated the transfer and then select that provider from the options that show up.
trans-unit.target: 请开始填写您发起转账的提供商的名称，然后从显示的选项中选择该提供商。

trans-unit.source: Click the "Reveal password" link right underneath your password field on this page.
trans-unit.target: 在本页点击密码字段下方的“显示密码”。

trans-unit.source: Type in your AwardWallet password and click Reveal. After that you should be seeing both your user name and your password in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 输入您的AwardWallet密码然后点击“显示”。然后您应该可以看到以文字形式显示的您的 用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Copy your user name and password and then paste (don't simply re-type) them into the login input boxes on the %short_name% website.
trans-unit.target: 拷贝您的用户名和密码并将它们粘贴（不要重新输入）%short_name%网站的登录 输入框中。

trans-unit.source: If %short_name% website is asking you some questions about your profile after you login, until you answer those questions, AwardWallet will not be able to retrieve your balance.
trans-unit.target: 如果%short_name%网站在您登录后询问您一些有关您个人档案的问题，只有在您回答了 这些问题之后AwardWallet才能查询您的余额。

trans-unit.source: Here is how this works, to add %short_name% account to AwardWallet you need to make sure you can successfully login to %short_name% via this page and you need to be able to see your own balance. %extend-text% If you are having difficulties, please click here to continue reading
trans-unit.target: 操作过程是这样的：要将%short_name%添加到AwardWallet，您需要确保您可以通过此页面 成功能录%short_name%而且您必须能看到您自己的 余额。%extend-text%如果您碰到问题，请点击这里继续 阅读

trans-unit.source: We also recommend that you create a separate user under your %short_name% account specifically for AwardWallet, you need to give it the "Card Admin" role, and provide AwardWallet with this account instead of your main account.
trans-unit.target: 我们还建议您在您的%short_name%账户下专门为AwardWallet创建一个单独的用户，您需要赋予该用户“卡片管理员”角色，并向AwardWallet提供这一账户而不是您的主账户。

trans-unit.source: Some times just being able to login is not enough. The number one reason why our users can't successfully add an account is invalid credentials. Here is how you can verify that you are entering valid credentials:
trans-unit.target: 有些时候仅仅能够登录还不够。导致我们的用户无法 添加账户的最常见原因就是登录信息不正确。您可以这样验证是否输入了正确的 登录信息：

trans-unit.source: As of now, our success rate at updating %short_name% accounts is %success_rate%% - this includes all of the accounts that were given to us with invalid credentials. We believe %short_name% is not broken right now however if you think otherwise please mark it as broken here and our support team will look into it.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们 更新%short_name%账户的成功率是%success_rate%% - 其中包括了那些提供给我们的 无效的登录信息。我们相信%short_name%目前并未发生故障，然而如果您认为确有故障， 请在这里将其标注为故障，我们的支持团队会进行检查。

trans-unit.source: The balance on this award program [ExpireAction] on %date%

We've determined that no points or miles are due to expire on this reward program. We cannot guarantee this, as reward program rules change all the time, so the best way to check is to contact [DisplayName] directly. We will do our best at monitoring this reward program, and notifying you of any changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们确定该奖励计划没有 即将过期的积分或里程。我们不能保证这一点，因为奖励计划的规则 经常发生变化，因此最好的方式是直接联系[DisplayName]。 我们会尽可能监视该奖励计划并在发生任何变化时通知您。

trans-unit.source: Here is how you can keep your %programName% %currency% from expiring
trans-unit.target: 以下是防止%programName%%currency%过期的方法

trans-unit.source:
This expiration date was calculated by AwardWallet and not by %displayName%, so this date could be inaccurate. AwardWallet has no way to guarantee the accuracy of this calculated expiration date. Please remember that the most accurate way to determine your point expiration date is to contact %displayName% directly. Here is how we got this value:

%instruction%
trans-unit.target:
该过期日期是由AwardWallet而不是%displayName%计算的， 因此该日期可能不准确。AwardWallet无法确保这一计算的过期日期的准确性。 请记住，了解您的积分过期日的最准确方式 是直接联系%displayName%。我们的计算方式如下：

%instruction%

trans-unit.source: At this point AwardWallet doesn't know how to get your expiration date for this program. We are constantly working on figuring out how to calculate expiration dates for reward programs. If you happen to know a way to determine expiration date for [DisplayName] by looking at your profile please send us a note with a detailed description of what you do to figure out expiration and we will attempt to implement it.
trans-unit.target: 目前AwardWallet不知道如何帮您获取该计划的过期日期。 我们正在持续努力研究如何计算不同奖励计划的过期日期。 如果您正好知道通过查看 您的档案就能确定[DisplayName]过期日期的方法，请告诉我们您确定 过期日期的具体方法，我们会尝试实现 这一方式。

trans-unit.source: AwardWallet.com is a personal interface for managing loyalty programs and is not intended for business use. There is another business interface that we have: http://business.AwardWallet.com. Your account looks like a business account based on the fact that you have added a total of %count% loyalty programs.
trans-unit.target: AwardWallet.com是用于个人管理忠诚度计划的界面而并非用于商业用途。我们另外有一个企业界面：http://business.AwardWallet.com。鉴于您添加了总共%count%个忠诚度计划，您的账户似乎是一个企业账户。

trans-unit.source: You are about to change the owner of %displayName% account to the new name: '%name%', however this account already has %count% accounts added to it. Such transaction would put this account over the %limit% account limit. Under the current personal interface you should not have more than %limit% loyalty accounts added.
trans-unit.target: 您将要把%displayName%账户的所有者变更为：'%name%'，但是该账户已经添加了%count%个账户。这一操作将会使该账户超过%limit%个账户的限制。在当前的个人界面中，您最多只能添加%limit%个忠诚度账户。

trans-unit.source: You can't change the owner on the selected program to %owner% as by doing so you will exceed the maximum number of programs (%limit%) that AwardWallet personal interface is intended to support.|You can't change the owner on the selected programs to %owner% as by doing so you will exceed the maximum number of programs (%limit%) that AwardWallet personal interface is intended to support.
trans-unit.target: 您不能将所选计划的所有者更改为%owner%，因为这样会超过AwardWallet个人界面允许支持的最大计划数 (%limit%)。

trans-unit.source: Please convert this personal account to a business account.

trans-unit.source:
Alexi is the co-founder and leads the development efforts of AwardWallet, which he launched in 2004. From its inception, Alexi has been AwardWallet’s product visionary. He is focused on continual improvement of AwardWallet to meet the needs of its %members%+ global members and to respond to the evolving rewards program landscape, which is reflected in AwardWallet’s recognized leadership in rewards management.

Prior to the creation of AwardWallet, Alexi worked in global enterprise IT Services organizations including, Aelita Software, Quest Software, and Dell. Over 16 years his responsibilities expanded from web development and support to technical account management and systems consulting. Throughout this time Alexi worked with clients including PepsiCo, Inc., Morgan Stanley, ExxonMobil, Fidelity Investments, United Technology, and Publix.

Alexi attended Utah State University where he played NCAA Division I Men’s College Tennis. He graduated Magna Cum Laude with a B.S. in Information Systems Management from Franklin University. Alexi further received a Master of Information Systems Management from DeVry University. Alexi and his wife have four kids; his hobbies include tennis, kiteboarding, snowboarding, and playing guitar.

trans-unit.source:
Erik joined the AwardWallet team in 2018. He attended the University of Michigan where he earned a Bachelor of Arts in Economics. During school, he discovered points and miles as a way to fund frequent international trips and a semester abroad in Santiago Chile.

Following school, he began traveling full time and co-founded Abroaders.com, a startup that helps travelers earn and redeem rewards points for maximum value.

Erik first connected with AwardWallet while looking for a tool to manage complex award bookings for clients. With the help of the AwardWallet booking platform, he and his team have redeemed over 49 million points for 2.2 million in airfare savings.

Erik lives in Austin, Texas with his wife Gabriela. When not obsessing about points and miles, his hobbies include cooking, photography, learning languages, exploring national parks, watching Michigan athletics (Go Blue!) and of course, travel.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source: In the GMail interface, click the 'Settings' gear -> 'See all settings'.
trans-unit.target: 在Gmail界面中，单击“设置”齿轮->“查看所有设置”。

trans-unit.source: Scroll to the bottom and click 'Create filters'.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到底部，然后单击“创建过滤器”。

trans-unit.source: Google may want to verify your identity again; if so, complete the verification.
trans-unit.target: Google可能会再次验证您的身份；如果是这样，请完成验证。

trans-unit.source: You are done; your AwardWallet filter has been created, and your travel plans will be built automatically for you going forward.
trans-unit.target: 设置过程已经完成；您的AwardWallet过滤器已经创建，今后您的旅行计划会自动为您创建。

trans-unit.source: Go to the 'Forwarding and POP/IMAP' tab.
Click the 'Forwarding and POP/IMAP' tab, and under the 'Forwarding:' heading, click the 'Add a forwarding address' button.
trans-unit.target: 单击“转发和POP/IMAP”选项卡，然后在“转发：”标题下，单击“添加转发地址”按钮。

trans-unit.source: In the 'Add a forwarding address' popup box, input %link_on%%email%%link_off% and click 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: 在“添加转发地址”弹出框中，填写%link_on%%email%%link_off%，然后单击“下一步”。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to set this up for your family members, please (1) select the right person at the top of this page and (2) make sure you do this entire setup in their Google Mailbox, not yours.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望为您的家庭成员进行此设置，请 (1) 在本页顶部选择适当的家庭成员并 (2) 确保您在该成员的Google邮箱中进行整个设置，而不是您自己的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: Google may want to authenticate you; if so, please follow the prompts.
trans-unit.target: Google可能会要求您进行身份验证；如果是这样，请按照提示操作。

trans-unit.source: Confirm that you want to set up forwarding by clicking 'Proceed'.
trans-unit.target: 单击“继续”确认设置转发。

trans-unit.source: Google will tell you that a confirmation link was sent to %userEmail% to verify permission. Please note that AwardWallet will auto-approve such a request; you do not need to contact our support. Instead, give it a few minutes and refresh the page. Typically, this takes 0 - 3 minutes; however, if our servers are busy, it may take a few hours, so you may have to come back to finish this up later.
trans-unit.target: Google会告诉您已向%userEmail%发送确认链接以验证权限。请注意，AwardWallet将自动批准此类请求；您不需要联系我们的支持人员。只需要稍等几分钟时间并刷新页面。通常，需要不超过3分钟；但是，如果我们的服务器繁忙，可能需要几个小时，所以您可能需要稍后再回来完成这一设置。

trans-unit.source: Download the %files% files. These files list the addresses from which we can parse travel confirmation emails. Feel free to inspect them in your text editor of choice. You will need to repeat steps 9 - 11 for each file separately.
trans-unit.target: 下载%files%文件。这些文件列出了我们可以解析旅行确认电子邮件的地址。您可以在自选的文本编辑器中检查这些文件。您需要对每个文件分别重复第9至11步。

trans-unit.source: Go to the 'Filters and Blocked Addresses' tab, click 'Import filters' -> 'Choose File', and select the just downloaded 'gmailFilter.xml' file from your Downloads folder.
trans-unit.target: 转到“过滤器和阻止的地址”选项卡，单击“导入过滤器”->“选择文件”，并从您的下载文件夹中选择刚刚下载的“gmailFilter.xml”文件。

trans-unit.source:
Jess joined the AwardWallet team in early 2016 as a member of the writing team. Hailing from New Zealand, Jess discovered points and miles while traveling full-time with his wife and son, utilizing rewards to reduce travel costs and relying on credit card perks to make travel more comfortable.

His extensive knowledge of frequent flyer programs was acquired through hands-on experience, research, and many hours behind the keyboard helping design and implement AwardWallet's backend tools and compliance systems.

When not immersed in his work at AwardWallet, you can find him running trails, cooking up a storm, wakeboarding, and traveling with his family. Jess is currently based in the idyllic Sunshine Coast in Queensland, Australia.
trans-unit.target:
Jess joined the AwardWallet team in early 2016 as a member of the writing team. Hailing from New Zealand, Jess discovered points and miles while traveling full-time with his wife and son, utilizing rewards to reduce travel costs and relying on credit card perks to make travel more comfortable.

His extensive knowledge of frequent flyer programs was acquired through hands-on experience, research, and many hours behind the keyboard helping design and implement AwardWallet's backend tools and compliance systems.

When not immersed in his work at AwardWallet, you can find him running trails, cooking up a storm, wakeboarding, and traveling with his family. Jess is currently based in the idyllic Sunshine Coast in Queensland, Australia.

trans-unit.source:
JT is AwardWallet’s Editor-In-Chief. JT originally joined the AwardWallet team in early 2020 as a freelance editor and writer, but he has been part of the points and miles ecosystem since 2014. Looking for a way to reduce the cost of a trip to China (back when it was expensive to fly to China), he found he could sign up for just one credit card to get enough miles to book the flights.

That experience prompted him to dive headfirst into the world of airline, hotel, and credit card points and miles. After working for a decade as a tax accountant, JT focused his analytical skills on writing about points, miles, and credit cards. He started contributing at The Points Guy in 2015 and published over 2,000 articles on the site.

In June 2017, Katie and JT sold or donated nearly all of their possessions to become digital nomads, proving firsthand how points, miles, and credit card rewards can drastically reduce the cost of travel. JT has logged over 1.6 million miles on 96 airlines, visited 64 countries, and maintains elite status with 8 airlines (including American Executive Platinum, Air Canada Aeroplan 75K, Asiana Diamond, and Malaysia Gold) and 6 hotel loyalty programs (including IHG Diamond, Hilton Diamond, and Marriott Titanium Elite)
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source: Here are the ways we can communicate with you
trans-unit.target: 我们可以通过以下渠道与您联系
关闭所有电子邮件通知

trans-unit.source: We only send you account security alerts or emails like "I Forgot My Password". All other notifications are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 我们仅向您发送账户安全提醒或电子邮件，例如“我忘记了密码”。所有其他通知都会关闭。

trans-unit.source: If your rewards are going to expire, we send you reminders at 90, 60, 30, and 7 days before their expiration.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的奖励即将过期，我们在过期日90、60、30和7天之前给您发送提醒。

trans-unit.source: Sent whenever we automatically import items to your AwardWallet travel timeline.
trans-unit.target: 在我们将任何内容自动导入您的AwardWallet旅行时间线中时发送。

trans-unit.source: If you have family members that you added to your profile just as names (they don't have their own AwardWallet accounts connected to you) you can choose if you wish to receive alerts for those people.

trans-unit.source: If we are aware of a new promotion such as a limited time bonus on a credit card we notify you. We may not always send it through all 3 channels even if you have all 3 checkboxes checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们获知了一项新的促销活动，例如信用卡限时奖励活动，我们会通知您。如果您勾选了3个选项，我们也不一定同时通过3个渠道发送通知。

trans-unit.source: Only sent when we make significant product updates.
trans-unit.target: 仅在我们有重大产品更新时发送。

trans-unit.source: If you use your personal referral link to invite users to AwardWallet, we notify you every time someone uses that link to register.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用您个人的推荐链接邀请用户加入AwardWallet，每当有人使用您的链接注册时我们会通知您。

trans-unit.source: For retail loyalty cards, we have an option to give you a popup with your card barcode whenever you get close to the store geographically. If you set up your retail loyalty cards this way you can disable all such notifications using this option.
trans-unit.target: 对于零售忠诚度卡片，我们提供一个选项，可以在您位于这一店铺附近时为您显示一个带有卡片条形码的弹出窗口。如果您这样设置了您的零售忠诚度卡片，您可以使用这一选项关闭所有此类通知。

trans-unit.source: For mobile and desktop notifications we alert you in real-time as we detect a change in your reward balances. For the email notifications, we aggregate your changed balances and send notices once per day, week or month based on your preference.
trans-unit.target: 对于移动设备和桌面通知，每当我们发现您的奖励余额有变动，我们会向您发送实时提醒。对于电子邮件通知，我们汇总您的余额变化并根据您的选择每天、每周或每月发送一次通知。

trans-unit.source: How convenient does the award program make it to earn points? For example, do they have special incentives for using the web or partners that will add points to your account when you purchase goods or services?
trans-unit.target: 奖励计划赚取积分有多方便？例如，当您购买商品或服务时，有没有针对网络或合作伙伴的特殊激励措施，能为账户增加积分？

trans-unit.source: How would you rate the award program customer service? Are the customer service representatives courteous and helpful?
trans-unit.target: 您如何评价奖励计划的客户服务？客服代表是否彬彬有礼，乐于助人？

trans-unit.source: Does the award program make it easy for you to redeem your miles? For example, can you redeem point for travel, hotels stays, etc. online? Are there blackout dates? Are there adequate seats reserved for award travel and hotel stays?
trans-unit.target: 奖励计划是否让您可以轻松兑换里程？例如，您是否可以在网上用积分兑换旅行、酒店住宿等？是否有限制日期？为奖励旅行预留的航班座位和酒店房间是否充足？

trans-unit.source: Once you get to the Elite levels of the award program how well do they take care of you? For example, do they frequently upgrade you without having to ask, use points or pay? Do they provide you with extra amenities in your room?
trans-unit.target: 当您进入奖励计划的精英级别，他们对您的照顾会有多好？例如，是否经常在不需要主动询问、不使用积分或不付费的情况下为您升级？有没有在您的房间里为您提供额外的备品？

trans-unit.source: Does the program allow you to use points with partners or only with the company associated with the program? Can you use points for other things beside airfare or hotel stays, like merchandise?
trans-unit.target: 计划是否允许您在合作伙伴处使用积分，还是只能在与该计划相关的公司使用积分？除了机票或酒店住宿之外，您是否可以将积分用于购买商品等其他物品？

trans-unit.source: How would you rate their online service? Is it easy to book hotel stays or air travel? Is their web site intuitive and easy to navigate?

trans-unit.source: Do you agree to scan your mailbox for itineraries and loyalty accounts?

trans-unit.source:
Please link your mailbox to your AwardWallet account so that we can do all the work for you! Specifically, we will scan your mailbox for the loyalty programs you participate in and will add them to your profile automatically.

If we find upcoming travel plans in your inbox we will also have them imported into AwardWallet. This is the easiest way to get set up with AwardWallet. We will not be gathering any of your contacts or sending any of them any emails. This step is needed only to get your AwardWallet account set up.
trans-unit.target:
请将您的邮箱关联到您的AwardWallet账户以便我们替您进行所有操作具体来说， 我们会扫描您的邮箱以搜索您参与的忠诚度计划，并自动将它们添加到您的档案中。

如果我们在您的收件箱中找到了即将到来的旅行计划，我们也会把它们导入AwardWallet。这是设置AwardWallet的最简单方法。 我们不会收集您的任何联系人信息或向他们发送任何邮件。该步骤仅用于设置您的AwardWallet账户。
